Reviews.Title: Samsung Dual View TL205
Reviews.Author: J. Sossamon
Reviews.Content: Usually, I'm a Canon man. I got this camera for my wife because she liked the dual view. And it is pretty cool, to be sure. We haven't got to use it a whole lot yet, but here's what I like so far: the camera is quick, light, inexpensive, good in low-light, and 12.2 megapixels, GOOD menus and quick access to the most important features. Did I mention it was inexpensive? I haven't used too many snap-shot digital cameras - two different Canon Powershots and now this one - so, I'm probably not the most seasoned critic. But I am kinda a gadget-geek, and I'm going to say this camera is well-deserving of the 5 stars I give it. And about how it compares to its big brothers - the other Samsung dual-view cameras - well, once again, this one is the most inexpensive. So for me, it was the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures and videos, but there's a major flaw
Reviews.Author: A Leece
Reviews.Content: I received this camera on January 6th, as a gift. I was thrilled. The camera took great pictures and was fairly easy to use once I played with it a while. There are several different picture settings, and each setting has more ways to fine tune your picture, which I loved. I also LOVED the face-flaw eraser setting. I take a lot of outdoor pictures and the details on leaves, trees, clouds, and sky were incredible.Notice that I used past tense to describe all of these things.On January 7th, I went for a hike and took my new camera with me. I was so excited! I took some great pictures and great footage.When I got back to my car, I noticed little black spots on the LCD. I turned it off and went home, and when I turned it on again, the spots were ebbing into little black lines.By the next day, two large lines were across the LCD. I could even see them when the camera was off. I took it back and exchanged it for another one.That night, we went out for dinner and I took the camera with me. Within taking about 10 pictures, the same thing happened-a long, thin black line appeared across the LCD.I fell in love with this camera and seriously considered keeping it despite the flaw, but then came to my senses when I realized that no brand new device should be doing that. I didn't exchange it again after I read customer reviews on the camera, and found that apparently this black line problem is a recurring one with this model.So basically, if you want to take the gamble and see if you're one of the lucky ones with no LCD problems, this is a great camera. I'm of the opinion something brand new should work completely, with no flaws within the first 24 hours.

Reviews.Title: Sad
Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera and have been wanting it since it was first released.  I finally purchased it and I'm returning it because it's way too slow.  It takes really nice pictures and the screen on the front is really a fantastic feature if you're someone that likes to take self portraits without needing a place to place the camera and use a timer.  That's something I do all the time with my husband.  I'm returning it because it takes a long time for the flash to fire and then recharge.  We have a 5 month old so we need a faster camera to capture all her precious little smiles that happen so fast!

Reviews.Title: Not the best, but not the worst either
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: The camera takes good pictures, and the front screen is fun, but there's already 2 black lines across the back screen..... I don't think it should damage that easily... It doesn't affect the outcome of the photo any though. It's just a nuisance.

Reviews.Title: OK LITTLE CAMERA - BUT HAS A PROBLEM
Reviews.Author: tczig
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for one reason, the dual view.  It takes good pictures, but nothing like an SLR.  I like the dual view, but never really use it (but, it is a good, novel feature).  My pictures are good, very vibrant.  But, after having it 5 months (and I take good care of cameras!), it developed spots inside of the LED screen.  First, it was a black line - best way to describe it is like an ink pen explosed inside it - then it became a bunch of "ink spots".  It does NOT affect the pictures; however, the spots are placed so that you cannot see some of the menu choices (that's a big problem).I called Samsung today, and got great customer service (quickly answered the phone).  He took a bunch of information and told me it's under warranty and to send it back, which I will do.If I ever see the camera again, I will be surprised.  I hated spending $129. on this camera and having it break within a few months.  My cameras usually last me a life time.Other than this problem, I like the little camera.  It takes good pictures.  But, again, nothing to compare to an SLR.  And, it has a lot of different settings, video, and good stuff like that.UPDATE:  I mailed the camera back to be repaired.  Samsung repaired it very quickly, shined it up and returned it.  Since receiving it back, I NEVER had that problem again.  I am happy with the camera now and appreciate Samsung's quick service on repairing it.  I have to admit, I was surprised at the great customer service from Samsung!  I use it a lot and, again, never had that problem again since it was repaired.  I upgraded the product from 3 stars to 4 stars based on Samsung's good service in standing by their product.ANOTHER UPDATE:  11/2011:  This past month, I found myself using this camera a lot - especially for the dual view to take pictures of myself!  What's good about the dual view feature, when you use it, it will focus on your face (it knows you are taking a self-portrait).  Other little cameras, when you do a self-portrait (holding the camera up and taking your own pic), it will focus somewhere else, so you get a nice picture but your face is out of focus.  This is an excellent feature as far as taking your own picture.  Also, I like the video on it better than the new cameras.Again, after that problem and Samsung fixing it, I never had another problem with it!  I actually like it now almost as much as my Canons!

Reviews.Title: Worst camera and worst customer service experience
Reviews.Author: MariaSanDiego
Reviews.Content: I always had Canon cameras and I should have stuck with those! When I got this camera I was excited to use it and right away was disappointed with it. It doesn't auto rotate pics like Canon and I was used to that. But that wasn't the main issue. It wouldn't focus very well, half of the pictures were blurry, the auto flash doesn't work well, the picture taking button was too sensitive and I would barely touch it before it would take a picture and no one was ready! The picture quality is very poor comparing to Canon! Then it would do random things like when I would be looking through the pictures, it would just go to the picture taking mode and open the zoom and flip through the menu options on its own! And then it got a screen problem, so I sent the camera back to Samsung thinking they would repair it...it was only a week old! But no, they just said it was physical damage and I had to pay $50 to fix the camera, which I don't even want back! I explained the camera had problems with it before, but they didn't care. All they said was "Sorry, problem with a screen is a result of physical damage, it's not covered under warranty!" So on top having a bad camera I also got the worst customer service! They just blame the problems on the customer and you have to pay for their malfunctioning products! What is really sad is that I have a TV, a blue-ray DVD player, a video camera, a printer and a monitor from Samsung and I wish they would take a better care of their loyal customers! But they just lost one because now I'm very disappointed and will never buy ANYTHING from Samsung EVER AGAIN!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: James H "James H"
Reviews.Content: I got this on sale for about $129, though its going for about $99 right now.Pros: Cheap/Affordable!, quality scenic photos, portable, lightweightCons: Feels cheap, everything from the buttons to the rotating options wheel wreaks of poor construction. VERY poor at taking up close pictures (Thinking of taking a picture of a receipt or a ID with this camera? Think again!). rear LCD screen feels smaller than similar sized LCD's. Doesn't retract the zoom feature when in photo viewing mode like my canon.Other notes:The front LCD really isnt as useful as one might think, unless you're taking a face shot of yourself, you most likely won't be using it.The rear LCD is a bit indented and looks smaller than other comparable LCD's.Most of the picture taking modes are useless... but that's to be expected with this pricing.Summary: Would I buy this camera again? well I wish I had bought it at that $99 price tag instead of $129. It's cheap, it works great for scenic photos, it would make a good present for a teenager as the frontal LCD is fancy all be it rather useless outside of self photos.

Reviews.Title: Buttons hard to read
Reviews.Author: G. Williams "giawilliams"
Reviews.Content: I needed a camera quickly and bought this camera today for a function this weekend. It is going back to the store tomorrow. The problem is the case of the camera is black plastic and the functions buttons on the back are black on black, making them almost impossible to read.  Why they put black on black is beyond comprehension.  This camera is going back as I need to be able to see what the buttons are for without a flashlight. Now that I'm reading other reviews the picture quality seems to be lacking in this camera also.

Reviews.Title: Do NOT waste your money!!!
Reviews.Author: Ryan Creech
Reviews.Content: This is the biggest waste of money I have ever spent!!!! I stored the camera in a hard protective pouch, NEVER dropped it, took great care of it & the 2nd time I used it lines started appearing through the screen. We have made numerous phone calls & emails over the course of 3 months & cannot get Samsung to help us get the camera fixed. They haven't even bothered to contact us back at all. This is the worst customer service ever. PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA!!!

Reviews.Title: Disappointing when it worked, frustrating when it died
Reviews.Author: Gary in The Lou "Gary in The Lou"
Reviews.Content: This camera was mediocre at best, and no better than my cell phone camera. The photos are somewhat fuzzy, the automatic exposure and lighting weren't making good adjusments and I had to override them almost every time I used the camera.And then the camera died, and I discovered how little Samsung cared about customer service.  (BTW - Samsung's reps are primarily located in the Philippines) and those folks care even less than the local customer service reps.My camera was only in use for three months when it died, and Samsung wouldn't just exchange it.  This review is written on December 1, and it looks like I will have to buy another camera because they can't promise that this camera will be back in time for Christmas.Upshot:  The camera is not worth the money at any price. The images were constantly fuzzy, and customer service is not the correct term for the way they approached my situation.I RECOMMEND THAT ANY PROSPECTIVE BUYER LOOK TO OTHER BRANDS BEFORE BUYING ANYTHING FROM SAMSUNG.  I'M SORRY I EVER GAVE THEM MY BUSINESS.

Reviews.Title: Worst 12MP camera!! Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Chow Lin
Reviews.Content: POS: Cheap!! Dual view was good but it works for my kid only for first few times.CON: It's like a cheap plastic toy. Poor picture quality. 12MP is a joke because my old Casio 5MP camera is better than this.DON'T BUY THIS CAMERA!!!!!

Reviews.Title: samsung dual view camera
Reviews.Author: bargaingrl
Reviews.Content: Great compact camera. Has smile and blink detection, great HD images. i've always had Kodak cameras and this beats it by a mile. had this camera about a month, LOVE IT!!!!

Reviews.Title: Avoid this camera
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: I had heard good things about the Samsung cameras, but couldnt find any online reviews for the TL205 since this was a new product. However, I took a gamble and bought this camera. This is probably the worst purchase of my life. Auto focus is horrible, and taking pictures in low light is not even worth it. I really wish I had taken this back before the return period expired. The interface / menu is nice. And the smile detection actually works pretty well, but it doesnt out-weigh the fact that this takes horrible quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: great on some things HORRIBLE on the most important part
Reviews.Author: cheapguy25
Reviews.Content: This camera is probably good for someone who doesn't care about picture quality at all.Pros*The camera has the front lcd which is cool*doesn't feel all that cheap*small form factor*lightweight*easy to useCons*horrible picture quality. The pictures are full of noise. and by noise I mean that colorful grainy stuff. In addition the camera's pictures are all extremely soft, out of focus basically.So yeah, I am back to my original statement, I wouldn't recommend this camera to anyone unless they don't care about picture quality at all.I did not buy this item on Amazon, I bought a refurbished one from another website called Woot!. Oh wait! Amazon owns Woot!. So I guess I did buy it from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Horrible.
Reviews.Author: shawnatron
Reviews.Content: I had seen many commercials for this camera, thought the front screen was a cool feature, and really needed a new digital camera. All the qualities I need seemed to be there, so I went ahead and bought it. I wished I had waited awhile and read more reviews and not just bought it because it was new and different and had that extra screen feature. It is SUCH a waste of money. I wish I had figured it out before my return policy expired, because it was such a disappointment. I brought it with me to Florida and went to a theme park and managed to get decent pictures only because I stood super still and had time to stand there and take a picture rather then shoot quick ones. I found that the button kept getting stuck whenever I tried to snap a quick picture, and I'd have to repeatedly press and hold until it actually got the shot. Then about a week later I brought it with me to a concert for a band that I have been waiting to see for 5 years, and I got nothing but blurry, horrible pictures. It was so disappointing. I repeatedly tried changing the settings thinking that would make a difference and it really didn't. I took 226 pictures that night and the only sharp, decent ones I got maybe counted to about 10. The zoom was horrible and I was only 5 rows from the stage, yet people I know who were 20 rows back had clearer pictures then I did, and made it look like they were where I was sitting. You could make out facial features and details with their pictures and it looked so close you'd think they were standing right in front of them, yet I could see the veins on the guitarists hands and couldn't even capture a solid picture. Needless to say I won't ever buy Samsung again, and have contemplated calling them up and telling them about their awful product but figured this would be much more beneficial. Do not waste your money. The front screen isn't even worth it, even if you take a lot of self portraits or pictures with other people, the screen may seem convenient but the picture will probably end up unfocused anyways, don't bother.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Dual View 12.2MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: K. Hersee "kphoto"
Reviews.Content: Takes awesome photos for a point and shoot. If you wait for a sale you can get it for under $130! Great colors, sharp images.

Reviews.Title: Screen issues and just takes bad pictures
Reviews.Author: Eli Lilly
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these about a year ago and, like others, mine developed a large black spot on the LCD.  I can deal with that, I suppose, but this camera just takes the worst pictures.  The only time it can take a decent, non-blurry photo is in the brightest daylight.  I bought my wife a Canon Powershot A800 for her birthday.  While on vacation recently, she used that camera and I used the TL205.  We shot the exact same photos at the same time from the same location.  Every one of her photos came out crisp and clear, far clearer than I would expect at the $79 price point, whereas at least half of my photos were a blurry mess.  Skip buying the TL205, it's just a really poor camera.

Reviews.Title: Basic
Reviews.Author: Miss MJ "MJ"
Reviews.Content: Not sleek, real basic for the way it's advertised. The camera's LCD gets black blotches on it, and i never dropped it. Waste of money, go with more expensive to get a camera that lasts longer.

Reviews.Title: My daughter loves it!  Great price, great vendor.
Reviews.Author: Maggie's Mom
Reviews.Content: Bought it refurbished, works perfectly.  USPS seems to have "lost" our first order but vendor shipped new one overnight with no problem.  I was very satisfied and would buy from them again.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: db72034
Reviews.Content: Our daughter has been wanting a new camera and we found this one at a very reasonable price and she loves it!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't focus in video
Reviews.Author: Connie
Reviews.Content: I like the fact that there's a small screen in the front, but right after the picture's taken, the camera must stay there for a second in order for the camera to process it and the picture not be blurry. It wouldn't be so much a problem if I had steady hands. Also, in video, when you put text close up, it won't focus, which I'm sad about b/c I like to film videos that involve reading small text from time to time.

Reviews.Title: Missing Something
Reviews.Author: Rene' C
Reviews.Content: It's a cool camera! The only thing I wish is that it took black & white picture or different effects.  I just like to carry a camera in my purse, it works for me.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected!
Reviews.Author: FoodDiva "FoodDiva"
Reviews.Content: I got this as a graduation gift and brought it with me on my trip to New York.  I was so excited when I got this camera because of the dual view...but I soon learned that this was not the camera for me.Shortly after I got the camera the back screen developed a black line down the middle...a little while after that a huge black spot showed up covering most of the screen.  I cannot see my pictures very well off of the screen now.I don't know if this is because I don't know how to use it...but I could only get a good picture every once in a while...and I have no idea how I got them when I did.  I played with the settings and 1 out of 16 photos would come out nice.  I could not get a nice picture if my life depended on it.  :(This is not a camera for dummies...I could not figure out anything.  Auto focus takes too long...by the time it focused...the moment would be over.  I ended up just holding down the button and praying I got something good.I would not recommend this product at all for people who just want a simple point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointing
Reviews.Author: Tom Milne
Reviews.Content: Had the camera for less than a year and it just quit. Sent it in to Samsung under warranty and they tell me that it was "Water Damage" and is not "fully" covered under their warranty. I am waiting to see what they offer me for replacement and at what cost. I did not think that using the camera outdoors would be so harsh on it. (I live in Oregon and it does rain here frequently.)The camera was fun while it lasted but my last Sony lasted 6 years and it was still working when I got this camera.

Reviews.Title: Used digcam that works as new
Reviews.Author: Edmundo
Reviews.Content: Used digcam that works as new. I've used it right away during our trip with my friends. Pictures are clear and crisp. So easy to operate. User friendly menu that are intuitive.

Reviews.Title: Great, easy to use camera.
Reviews.Author: christopher h.
Reviews.Content: This is an easy to use camera with  a great  front display for taking  self pics. I love the menu wheel, which makes it easy to change picture modes.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas D.
Reviews.Content: takes great pictures and the child feature on the front is great makes and kid smile and laugh. Is a must buy and great price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mr &Ms.H; "Mr &Ms.H;"
Reviews.Content: Takes wonderful photos. Easily captures children. Has tons of different settings. Takes professional quality photos. Would highly recommend! Lightweight and compact.

Reviews.Title: 3rd Grader Loves This Phone
Reviews.Author: K. F. Judd "Papa Judd"
Reviews.Content: Front facing LCD is perfect for selfies plus the camera is easy to use and even does videos.  Got it used for less than $50 and was the perfect birthday gift for an 8 yr-old.

Reviews.Title: good quality for the price.
Reviews.Author: Emily Lewallen
Reviews.Content: It was sent to me in good shape just wish it had a directions for optimal use manual.  I am very happy with the price for the quality.

Reviews.Title: El articulo perfecto
Reviews.Author: Siul Vidal
Reviews.Content: El articulo perfecto. Me gusto bastante. Lo recomiendo 100%. Es de buena calidad. Si volvería a comprarle a este vendedor.

Reviews.Title: Very useful for the front screen
Reviews.Author: William Delgado V. "Wilito"
Reviews.Content: My wife loves this camera for the front screen, ideal for her auto photos. The cons (personal opinion) is the quality of the images. I have a Sony and the quality of the images it is much better.

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Christip
Reviews.Content: It takes fuzzy pictures sometimes but I found out how to fix that with the camera. It's really worth the price and I have had this camera for 2 years.

Reviews.Title: Broken after 1 year....  Good while I had it....
Reviews.Author: Jona
Reviews.Content: HATE that it didn't last longer than I expected.  I like this camera b/c it's user friendly and small.  Hate it for some blurry and sometimes reddish pictures (I'd like to think it's on my part not the camera's---- definitely not like SLR cameras).  I used it daily and really loved the dual LCD Screens.  It is not an important factor, but really nice & fun addition.  Not a big fan of a 3x optical zoom, would prefer a bigger number.  The price is not bad.  I even used the 1 year warranty repair.  Samsung representatives were great. Got mine for $99.99.  I would consider a better camera.  Battery life is okay.  ...  It was fun while it lasted.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: David Norred
Reviews.Content: very happy with this camera.  it is easy to use, produces great pictures.  files are quite large though.  i'll keep it!

Reviews.Title: No complaints
Reviews.Author: chrometoyota
Reviews.Content: This camera has been very reliable, haven't had any issues. Being a Samsung, you always get what you pay for!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera~
Reviews.Author: Caitlin
Reviews.Content: Great little camera. I bought this for my trip to Puerta Vallarta and this little camera did not fail!Takes great pictures and is easy to use. This item came promptly in time for my trip with no issues.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Varo"
Reviews.Content: great camera, it takes very good photos, nice colors, good sized images, nice touch to have a front LCD display

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Dylan
Reviews.Content: This camera is the best I have ever had. It has many things you can do it has a silver wheel that has Scene( it has Frame Guide, Portrait, Landscape, Close Up, Text, Sunset, Sunrise, Back light, Fireworks and Beach and Snow. Night(the longest Exposure is 8 seconds and 7.6 aperture), Beauty shot, DIS (Digital Image Stabilization), Program, Auto, Smart Auto, and Movie. It has 12.2 Mega Pixels, the largest setting for ISO is ISO 1600, you zoom by turning a switch around the picture button. The longest timer you can have is 10 seconds the shortest is 2 seconds or you can do double witch does 10 seconds then takes another picture in 2 seconds. It has 2 settings that have Normal (AF) that is 80 cm or more away or there is Macro tat is closer than 80 cm. It has a face detection, a smile detection, a smile shot, and a blink detection that takes 2 pictures if it detects a blink. All that stuff is a lot of fun but the reason I chose 4 stars was because about after 2 years when I bought the camera the pixels screen started to disappear but than after about 5 months they started to come back which was good. This camera has lasted me a long time and I have took hundreds of pictures.

Reviews.Title: My camera deleted some fotos many times
Reviews.Author: Johnny Gus
Reviews.Content: I used the camera on some 5 or 6 trips. In 3 of them I lost photos after shooting them. The camera seemed to have taken the pictures, but when I turned it off and on again the pictures were gone. This problem happened a few times and today (2 months after I bought it) the camera can't read any SD card or take photos anymore. Very frustrating... I just formated it and it looks like it's working well again, but I'll only be sure of that afer some tests. The video mode has also a wierd particularity: when you zoom during the filmage the sound goes mute. Very bad, but probably they did that in order to hide the loud sound of the zoom engine working. My camera came with a bad finish on the bottom, a bad fiting of a small plastic part made the bottom of the camera bend and I had to loose the screws and cut a pin to release this plastic part, then the camera could be assembled correctly (another made in china result...). Another point that I didn't like is the screen (the regular one). It gets too much fingerprints and any other kind of prints of anything that touches it. I'd probably buy a anti-fingerprint screen protector when buying this camera.However, it's a light camera, the frontal screen is very useful (although every time you turn it on the camera goes to "no-flash" mode, what makes it difficult to obtain a good picture) and it charges very quick (can be charged on USB or power).

Reviews.Title: A very nice Compact Camera.
Reviews.Author: M. Rivera
Reviews.Content: I was looking to up grade to a new but not pocket- breaking camera. portable, easy to use & very good pictures. I like that it has a dual screen as my wife likes to take many pictures of her & the kids together. It's not the best Camera out there but for my simple needs, it does quite well .

Reviews.Title: Samsung TL205 12
Reviews.Author: ludgero da conceicao
Reviews.Content: exelente megapíxeles de cámara digital con zoom óptico 3x, dos pantallas LCD, Smart Auto, Estabilización Digital de Imágenes, de plata

Reviews.Title: Samsung Dual View Camera A+!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Joseph
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item looking for a camera to take self shots at the bar and going out. I found this Samsung Dual View camera and it was a great investment. Its convenient, sleek, and the Dual screen in the front is not noticeable until the camera is put into that setting. A+

Reviews.Title: CAMERA
Reviews.Author: CINDY TYBOR
Reviews.Content: MY SON LOVED IT. PERFECT GIFT FOR CHRISTMAS, YOU CAN TAKE A PICTURE OF YOURSELF AND SEE WHAT YOUR SNAPPING FAST SHIPPING

Reviews.Title: Got this last Christmas for my teenage daughter--its been perfect!
Reviews.Author: MonaXTC
Reviews.Content: This camera has been put through its paces by my 9th grader for the past year, and there is not a bad thing I can say about it.  Great pictures, the battery holds a charge and charges as expected.  The SD card easily transfers pictures from the camera to our laptops.  There is nothing to complain about!  It's held up just fine from her purse, to backpack, and all the normal wear and tear you'd expect from a less than careful operator!  A see a few reviewers have had issues with the screens; I wonder if there was a bad batch???  I just noticed this camera is available at BJs for $49~  I would not hesitate to snap one up if you're looking for a great little digital point and shoot!

Reviews.Title: Can't get a decent photo on this camera
Reviews.Author: clevegirl1
Reviews.Content: i have been a photographer for over 20 years and mostly use DSLRs.  i wanted another point & shoot camera and loved the idea of a front LCD screen.  but i just cannot get a good photo on this camera.  i am using the fastest media card and still my photos are blurry.  i think i'll go back to kodak or nikon for a cheap point & shoot.  this one just didn't do it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Macy
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my honeymoon! I love the front screen especially since we did not have people to take pictures for us! It was great and all of over pictures have turned out wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: juan
Reviews.Content: buy this camera even my father's birthday is very good, I have not had any problems with it, take great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Broke in less than one month!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a birthday gift for my mom and the flash broke in just a few weeks. Now I get to fight with the Samsung company customer service about the warranty. Thanks for nothing.

Reviews.Title: It's a nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Sewin Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I can say that this camera it's very nice because the images are very clear and it's easy to use, the front display is really nice, you can take your pictures yourself and like you want.

Reviews.Title: For people who actually like taking bad photos
Reviews.Author: jadeeye28
Reviews.Content: Like another review said, I only recommend this camera to people who could care less about the quality of the photos they take.  Probably the only feature that makes this camera stand out is the front LCD screen--which is the only reason I give this a 2-star rating.  I haven't had very many photos turn out well, even though I've reset all functions or changed them to potentially give a decent snap.  I'm an SLR user, so manual settings are not new to me.  However, even though this camera is very easy to figure out, the poor quality of photos has been a real disappointment to me. I've also had some issues with the LCD on the back--not the black lines or spots, just places where the crystals seem to get stuck or react to touch.  It hasn't affected the actual pictures, though, so that is not such a big deal.  I would not recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Rosemary G.
Reviews.Content: This was actually a gift for my mom and she loved it, she really wanted a touch screen camera but she ended up loving this one.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: jennysue75
Reviews.Content: I was not sure what to expect when ordering this camera, but I was pleased when it arrived.  This camera was exactly as stated in the description.  It is a very good camera and easy to use.  It is light weight and take great pictures.  This is a great camera for anyone to have.  I definitly recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Damaged screen with black spots
Reviews.Author: Iván Villagómez
Reviews.Content: Damaged screen with black spots, they sent me a camera used new request and pay for new.The sharp imagesSamsung DualView TL205 - Digital camera - compact - 12.2 Mpix - optical zoom: 3 x - supported memory: SD, SDHC - silver

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: farvalu
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! I was a little unsure whether I would like it because of the zoom but it is not nearly as bulky as it looks in the picture. I wish there was more internal memory. There is only enough for one picture.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Longanecker
Reviews.Content: This was a great camera for the price. Easy to use...the only downside is that the refurbished camera does not come with a complete user manual; however, you can download a PDF user manual online.

Reviews.Title: samsung dual view
Reviews.Author: Yusri B. Muhamad
Reviews.Content: bought the samsung dual view for my daughters birthday and shes love it! took very good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value buy
Reviews.Author: Ammar
Reviews.Content: A great piece for someone who doesn't indulge in heavy duty photography. I use it to take casual pictures and likw the fact that it is compact, easy to use and has decent picture quality. Thats all I need and it comes at a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Love This Camera!!
Reviews.Author: S. Seneca
Reviews.Content: Takes very good pictures, quick charge and battery lasts a long time!! Have recommended to friends and will continue to :)

Reviews.Title: The Best Camera I've Bought Yet.
Reviews.Author: Triana
Reviews.Content: I bought is camera for my graduation & I had my sister taking the pictures. She fell in love with my camera. She like my camera better than her own.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Dualview
Reviews.Author: Annette Castillo
Reviews.Content: I really have no idea how this product works because the seller sent the wrong battery pack & charger.
